personal_info.bio: I am a passionate front-end developer, designer, and programmer specializing in creating dynamic and responsive web applications. Skilled in blending aesthetics with functionality, I am committed to continuous learning and innovation.
personal_info.interests: Coding, UI/UX design, exploring new technologies, and contributing to community development.
personal_info.education: Bachelor's in Computer Science Engineering from SR Institute of Management and Technology, Lucknow (2021 â€” 2025).

bio.title: Education
bio.description: Pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science Engineering at SR Institute of Management and Technology, Lucknow, with a current CGPA of 7.7.

bio.title: Experience
bio.description: Completed internships in web development and graphic design, enhancing skills in JavaScript, Node.js, CSS, HTML5, Figma, and Canva.

bio.title: Community Involvement
bio.description: Serving as Chairperson of the IEEE Computer Society at SRIMT and volunteering at Lucknow AI Labs, contributing to community development and research initiatives.
